Mission.Author: KingRaptor
Mission.Description: Some mission testing/techdemo stuff. Not for playing!
Mission.DescriptionStory:
The quick brown fox [b]jumps[/b] over the lazy dog
[i]italics[/i] [u]underline[/u] [s]strikethrough[/s]
how low can you go?
Mission.Name: Mission Editor Test

TriggerLogic.Name: Convo Message
TriggerLogic.Message: I am a Singularity Reactor. I am big and powerful. Sfireman polishes my containment sphere every day.

TriggerLogic.Name: Convo Message
TriggerLogic.Message: The almighty Radar Tower knows all and sees all!

TriggerLogic.Name: Custom Action (Alternate)
TriggerLogic.CodeStr: local cam = { mode = 4, px = 1500, py = 350, pz = 2050, ry = math.rad(-125), rx = math.rad(-45) } Spring.SetCameraState(cam, 0)

TriggerLogic.Name: Convo Message
TriggerLogic.Message: You spin my head, right round, right round...

TriggerLogic.CodeStr: local cam = { mode = 4, px = 2400, py = 250, pz = 2100, ry = math.rad(135), rx = math.rad(-30) } Spring.SetCameraState(cam, 0)
local cs = {} cs.px = 1950 cs.py = 600 cs.pz = 2100 cs.rx = -math.rad(63.74) cs.ry = math.pi Spring.SetCameraState(cs, 1)

TriggerLogic.Name: Convo Message
TriggerLogic.Message: Commander, I believe these people are in need of some laser therapy. Shall we?

TriggerLogic.Name: Custom Action (Alternate)
TriggerLogic.CodeStr:
local value = 1 local score = Spring.GetTeamRulesParam(0, "score") if score == 300 then value = 2 elseif score == 4000 then value = 3 end
GG.mission.SendMissionVariables({ testMission_journal1 = value })
